alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 12:55PM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will transition to snow this evening and by late tonight accumulating snow will be possible. Snow packed and potentially icy roads will create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
